author: gurukamath
content:
The version of the tests relevant to spurious-dragon is under
https://github.com/ethereum/legacytests/blob/d7abc42a7b352a7b44b1f66b58aca54e4af6a9d7/Constantinople/BlockchainTests/GeneralStateTests/stPreCompiledContracts2

I did the check and `CallEcrecoverCheckLength_d0g0v0` as well as `CallEcrecoverCheckLengthWrongV_d0g0v0` already pass with the current specs.
